value.name: Fallen Firefighters honored in annual memorial ceremony
value.description: A crowd gathered Tuesday at the Fallen Heroes Memorial on South Lafayette Street to pay homage to firefighters who lost their lives in the line of duty. The day marked the 42nd year for the annual Cleveland County Firefighter Memorial Service.
